content: wear these to your next palestine rally or everyday everywhere i showed earrings here but you can attach the watermelon piece to anything like keychain or necklace which is why i didn t name this pattern watermelon earrings size of the piece depends on the size of the thread the hook and your crochet gauge i use a 1 75mm hook and end up with a 1/2 slice that measures ~3cm along the widest edge i also made a palestine pin and inverted-triangle earrings as seen in the photos but i don t currently have patterns for them just included them as someone may find them inspiring
